Instruction: 'Shred the green cabbage and red cabbage.'
In a large bowl, combine shredded green cabbage, shredded red cabbage, grated carrots, and chopped cilantro.'
In a separate bowl, whisk together peanut butter, rice vinegar, soy sauce, honey, lime juice, sesame oil, and red pepper flakes to make the dressing.'
'Pour the dressing over the cabbage mixture and toss until well coated.'
'Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before serving to allow flavors to meld.'
